As your boyfriend, I would never engage in actions like calling you names, giving angry looks, putting down your friends, saying things to scare you, or making you do something embarrassing.

call you names - NOT MY STYLE (I'd never do that!)
give you angry looks - NOT MY STYLE
put down your friends - NOT MY STYLE
say things to scare you - NOT MY STYLE
make you do something embarrassing - NOT MY STYLE

open to your ideas - BOYFRIEND

listen attentively to you - BOYFRIEND
make an effort with your family - BOYFRIEND

As your boyfriend, I want you to feel safe, heard, and seen. I would never intentionally make you feel bad about yourself or try to control you. My goal is to support you, make you laugh, and be your rock in tough times.

Let's focus on the positive aspects of our relationship instead!
